name: Welcome To Sweden (Season 1)
summary: Welcome to Sweden follows New York accountant Bruce as he moves with his girlfriend Emma to her homeland, Sweden, and their crazy adventures with her weird family.
info:
• 中文名: 欢迎来到瑞典（第一季）
  • 放送星期: 周四
  • 集数: 10
  • 开始: 2014-03-21
  • 结束: 2014-05-14
  • 类型: 情景喜剧
  • 国家/地区: 瑞典
  • 语言: 英语 瑞典语
  • 每集长: 22分
  • 频道: The Comedy Network(Canada)
  • 电视网: TV4(Sweden) NBC(United States)
  • 首播国家: 瑞典
  • 官方网站: http://www.tv4.se/welcome-to-sweden
  • imdb_id: tt3463606
  • wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Welcome_to_Sweden_(2014_TV_series)
  • 编剧: Greg Poehler / Josephine Bornebusch / Niclas Carlsson
  • 导演: Carl Åstrand
  • 摄影: Johan Holmquist
  • 美术: Maria Sohlman
  • 剪辑: Mattias Morheden / David Norden / Emil Nikkhah / Joakim Tessert
  • 音乐: Andreas Grill / Nich Malmeström

eps.name: Day One / Välkommen
eps.desc:
Bruce Evans quits his job as a celebrity accountant in New York to move to Sweden with the love of his life, Emma. Already on his first day he has to face new challenges in his adopted country, and above all, he has to meet his girlfriend's strange family. Bruce arrives at the airport where Emma picks him up; as she has rented out her apartment during her time in the USA, they now have to stay with her family until they can find a new place to live.
Guest star: Amy Poehler

U.S. air date:2014-07-10

eps.name: Learn the Language / Språket
eps.desc:
Bruce and Emma are trying to adapt to their new lives in Sweden, and are especially frustrated over not having any place for private time with each other. Bruce tries to learn to speak Swedish. He also meets with one of his previous clients, and finds an unexpected friend.
Guest star: Will Ferrell

U.S. air date:2014-07-17

eps.name: Proving Love / Lägenhet
eps.desc:
Bruce and Emma finally move into Emma's flat in Stockholm and Bruce must get used to the Swedish cultural differences. The couple does not get the reaction they expected from the Swedish Immigration officials when applying for Bruce's residency. Meanwhile, Bruce's belongings arrive from the States, causing more tension in their relationship.
Guest star: Aubrey Plaza

U.S. air date:2014-07-24

eps.name: Get a Job / Farthinder
eps.desc:
Bruce starts to look for work and a previous client of his, Gene Simmons, finds out that Bruce has moved to Stockholm.

U.S. air date:2014-07-31

eps.name: Fitting In / Vänner
eps.desc:
While trying to make new (Swedish) friends, Bruce instead encounters problems with his older Iraqi friend. Bruce tries to hang out with Viveka in an attempt to get her to accept his and Emma's relationships.

U.S. air date:2014-08-07

eps.name: Parents! / Föräldrar
eps.desc:
Bruce gets a visit from his parents (Patrick Duffy, Illeana Douglas) who are shocked by life in Sweden. Emma tells Bruce that she believes she is pregnant.

U.S. air date:2014-08-21

eps.name: Homesick / Lagom
eps.desc:
Amy Poehler offers Bruce a huge raise if he'll go back to New York and resume his old job and when he doesn't accept the offer, she enlists the help of Aubrey Plaza. Plaza then flies to Sweden and begins to stalk Bruce in an attempt to get him to go back. Bruce attempts to hire Swedish celebrities as his clients.
Guest star: Björn Ranelid, Björn Ulvaeus

U.S. air date:2014-08-21

eps.name: Breakups / Avsnitt 8
eps.desc:
A family affair stops Bruce and Emma's plans to move back to the United States. Bengt takes advice from Bruce on how to flirt with a woman. Emma allows a friend to crash on their couch, only for Bruce to later discover he's an ex-boyfriend of hers.
Guest star: Malin Åkerman

U.S. air date(Online):2014-08-27

eps.name: Separate Lives / Saknad
eps.desc:
Bruce has returned to New York to help Amy Poehler with her financial problems. Emma tries to get her old boyfriend to move out of her apartment. Wanting to feel young again, Viveka goes out partying with her daughter.
Guest star: Aubrey Plaza

U.S. air date:2014-08-28

eps.name: Home / Återförening
eps.desc:
Bruce discovers the truth from Aubrey Plaza. Emma and Gustav want to reunite their parents. Bruce goes back to Sweden but encounters problems after landing.
Guest star: Amy Poehler

U.S. air date:2014-08-28
